segments.text: This looks like a typical kitchen moment gone wrong.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The faucet's running full blast and the sink's overflowing onto the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman in the apron is polishing that plate so carefully.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She has no idea about the water flooding everywhere.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: One of her shoes is already soaked in the puddle.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Those stacked dishes on the counter might get ruined too.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Now look at the boy on the step stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's stretching up to grab cookies from the open cabinet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool looks so unstable, like it's about to tip over.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The little girl is reaching up too, excited for her treat.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They're being so naughty taking cookies without asking.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden outside the window is peaceful, what a contrast.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel bad for the mom; she's missing all this mischief.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Someone needs to yell and stop this before accidents happen.
segments.speaker: PAR
